titles.title: Perkins Loan Program Inflation Adjustment Act of 2016
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the Secretary of Education to annually adjust Federal Perkins loan amounts for inflation.
Perkins Loan Program Inflation Adjustment Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Perkins Loan Program Inflation Adjustment Act of 2016
This bill amends title IV (Student Assistance) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to adjust the maximum annual and aggregate amount that a student may borrow under the Federal Perkins Loan program to account for inflation.
